attributes.action: Make ww1 and ww2 a statutory requirement of the British curriculum
attributes.additional_details:
It has come to light that the subject of history covering both WW1 and WW2 has become a non statutory.
This cannot be acceptable for two reasons.
These two events in recent history , have shaped the world and more importantly the country that we live in .
Plus the lessons which have been learned from these events should not be forgotten , allowing them to be repeated in future. This is equally as dangerous as what has been before .
"Those who fail to learn from history are doomed to repeat it "
Winston Churchill
